title: Alexandre Belinga
text:
Alexandre Belinga (born 25 August 1962) is a Cameroonian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach who once coached the <a href="Cameroon%20national%20football%20team">Cameroon national team</a>.
As a player, he was a squad member for the <a href="1981%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1981 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>.
